item.title: Spotting Condemnation Posing as Conviction: Part 1
item.description: One of the enemy's favorite tricks is to try to bring condemnation to God's people. "Satan" means "accuser" and he never fails to live up to the title. But not only does he accuse, he lies and says it is coming from God! Let's look at what Paul called "godly sorrow," a perfect picture of Christian conviction. Even if my letter made you sorrowful, I don’t regret sending it (even though I felt awful for a moment when I heard how it grieved you).
